description:
This table contains the payment adjustments from value-based programs for AP Claim procedures.





To link this tableï¿½s service line information back to a claim header, join this table to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS on the TX_ID column.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMPUTED_PROGRAM_ADJ
columns.description: The value-based program adjustment amount for the procedure, as computed by the system.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_PROGRAM_ADJ
columns.description: The value-based program adjustment amount for the procedure, as overridden by the user.

columns.name: PROGRAM_ADJ_COMMENT
columns.description: The value-based program payment adjustment comment entered by the system when calculating the adjustment or by a user when overriding the adjustment.
